verses.verse: And at that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall <S%H4317>Michael<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> up, the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8269>prince<s%> which <S%H5975>stands<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people:<s%> and there shall be a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as <S%H3808>never<s%> was since there was a <S%H1471>nation<s%> even to that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H6256>time:<s%> and at that <S%H6256>time<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book.<s%>

And <S%H7227>many<s%> of them that <S%H3463>sleep<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> shall <S%H6974>awake,<s%> <S%H428>some<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H428>some<s%> to <S%H2781>shame<s%> and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1860>contempt.<s%>

And they that be <S%H7919>wise<s%> shall <S%H2094>shine<s%> as the <S%H2096>brightness<s%> of the <S%H7549>firmament;<s%> and they that turn <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H6663>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

But you, O <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H5640>shut<s%> up the <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H2856>seal<s%> the <S%H5612>book,<s%> even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end:<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H7751>run<s%> to and <S%H7751>fro,<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall be <S%H7235>increased.<s%>

Then I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8147>two,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> on <S%H2008>this<s%> side of the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on that side of the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>

And one <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was on the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall it be to the <S%H7093>end<s%> of these <S%H6382>wonders?<s%>

And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was on the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> when he <S%H7311>held<s%> up his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> by him that <S%H2416>lives<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> that it shall be for a <S%H4150>time,<s%> <S%H4150>times,<s%> and an <S%H2677>half;<s%> and when he shall have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> to <S%H5310>scatter<s%> the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things shall be <S%H3615>finished.<s%>
And I <S%H8085>heard,<s%> but I <S%H995>understood<s%> not: then <S%H559>said<s%> I, O my <S%H113>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall be the <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> things?

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> your way, <S%H1840>Daniel:<s%> for the <S%H1697>words<s%> are <S%H5640>closed<s%> up and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> shall be <S%H1305>purified,<s%> and made <S%H3835>white,<s%> and <S%H6884>tried;<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall do <S%H7561>wickedly:<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H995>understand;<s%> but the <S%H7919>wise<s%> shall <S%H995>understand.<s%>

And from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice shall be <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away,<s%> and the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> that makes <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> up, there shall be a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H2442>waits,<s%> and <S%H5060>comes<s%> to the <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
But <S%H3212>go<s%> you your way till the <S%H7093>end<s%> be: for you shall <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in your <S%H1486>lot<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H3117>days.<s%>
